long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GNGEO is a Neo Geo emulator for Google(TM) Chrome OS, Chrome OS Flex.

It's capable of running 100+ ROM sets.

Of course, you need a Neo Geo bios. 
A neogeo bios (neogeo.zip) consists of the folowing files: 
- vs-bios.rom, 
- usa_2slt.bin, 
- asia-s3.rom, 
- sp-s2.sp1, 
- sfix.sfx, 
- 000-lo.lo

Features unlimited save states.

CHANGELOG
- Added support for gamepad (One device only) [Tested gamepads: Google(TM) Stadia, Microsoft(R) Xbox, SONY(R) Playstation].
- Added help section.
- Added import bios.
- Added sync/reset settings.
- Added keyboard mapper.
- Added multiplayer support up to two players.
- Added toggle fullscreen for all resolutions.
- Added save game.
- Added recent ROMs menu [Max. 100 ROMs].
- Added load ROMs from ZIP file.
